data.text:
About this Item

164 pages. Very good hardback and jacket. No inscriptions. National Jewish Book Awards sticker to front of jacket. A little fading and cloth creasing to edges of head and tail of cover spine. --- General information: please email for any more information or condition photos. There may be other minor faults not included here, but this description should include all important points and convey accurately the overall conditon of the book(s). We are happy to give a more detailed description (by volume where applicable) on request. Posted next day (Mon-Fri) from the UK. We normally post by Royal Mail 1st class within the UK, but may use a slower service for books over 1kg or multiple orders or a tracked service for higher value orders. We normally post by Royal Mail Airmail for overseas deliveries, and may request additional postage (at cost) for heavier books or for tracking (buyers always have the option to cancel the order if we do so). Seller's business information

Jaycey Books

United Kingdom

Terms of Sale:

Orders are accepted via ABE Books only. Postage and packaging as per Abebooks policies. Condition is described as accurately as possible. If you are dissatisfied, the book may be returned within 14 days of receipt for a full refund. Please email us before returning the book. Please also contact us if you have any problems or questions. We can email condition photos on request. Our Email is jaycey@booksandpots.com

Shipping Terms:

Orders are posted next day (Monday to Friday) excluding bank holidays. Shipping costs are based on books weighing up to 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required. If so, you do, of course, always have the option to cancel the order if you do not wish to pay the extra postage. We normally post by 1st class post within the UK and Airmail for overseas post. We may choose an alternative method of posting for heavy books or multiple orders.
